column5: Heading to the French for a week, but thinking about extending the trip to a place called Mountain Cove Lodge on Panache Lake.  Rate is very good.  Anyone fished it?  Don't want to waste my time.  Walleye is main target.  Any other recommendations for great walleye within 2 hours of the French?  If I am already driving that far, another 2 hours for a couple days is nothing.  I am going on the cheap, so inexpensive is key.  Thanks in advance!
